Getting Started

Home/Getting Started

Create Your Account

Sign up today to unlock exclusive listings, broker insights, and personalized shortlists tailored to your needs. Use your work email or phone number to register securely, then complete your profile to receive smarter recommendations based on locality, budget, and property type. With your account, you can save searches, shortlist properties, and get instant alerts when matching homes go live.

You’ll get:

  • Secure sign-up with work email or phone verification
  • Personalized property recommendations by budget, locality, and type
  • Save searches, create shortlists, and get real-time property alerts
Sign Up Now →

Add & Transfer Lead

Learn how to quickly add new leads and seamlessly transfer them between team members. This video shows the complete process from capturing details to handing off leads for collaboration. You’ll see how simple it is to record essential information like name, contact, and interest, update lead status with follow-up notes, and then assign the lead to the right teammate in just a click. By the end, you’ll understand how easy it is to keep your pipeline organized, ensure no opportunity is missed, and improve teamwork across your sales process.

In this video, you’ll learn how to:

  • Add a new lead with name, contact, and interest
  • Update lead status and include follow-up notes
  • Transfer a lead to a teammate with one click
  • Keep your pipeline clean and organized for better results
Go to Leads →
Quick Tips
  • Watch the intro video and follow the highlights.
  • Complete profile basics before exploring features.
  • Use nearest regions for faster onboarding.
  • Keep documents under 10MB for quick uploads.
  • Enable notifications to stay updated.
Popular Topics
  • Verification steps and KYC overview.
  • Creating and managing leads effectively.
  • Optimizing regions and search filters.
  • Sharing leads securely with your network.
